p: From the group of flavanols, epicatechin was found in the wild bilberry leaves extract which was in accordance with the literature data [ 18]. Procyanidin was also detected ( Figure 1, Table 3). Stilbenes were detected as well in the tested wild bilberry leaves extract ( Figure 1, Table 3). The content of resveratrol was 7.25 mg/g, which is to the best of our knowledge the first report of the presence of this compound in the wild bilberry leaves. Pyrogallol was determined to be present in the amount of 2.45 mg/g ( Figure 1, Table 3).
